data.text: @WILKESmusic @nodoubt @Spotify @NBCTheVoice @gwenstefani @blakeshelton @kelly_clarkson I got you brother. It’s gonna be on my next record!!!!!! Miss you brother! Peace and blessings to you and your family!!!! 🌎❤️
@RayshunLaMarr @nodoubt @Spotify @NBCTheVoice @gwenstefani @blakeshelton @kelly_clarkson Hahaha one of these days I want a recording of “everybody talk to Wilkes.”

@WILKESmusic @nodoubt @Spotify @NBCTheVoice @gwenstefani @blakeshelton @kelly_clarkson That was such an inspired version. One of my favorite Voice performances.
I remember getting all excited bc you were crushing the twitter vote that night, then the huge disappointment with the shocking final results.
@WILKESmusic @nodoubt @Spotify @NBCTheVoice @gwenstefani @blakeshelton @kelly_clarkson It’s so dope!!!! “Eerybody talk to Wilkes” 🎵🎵
@WILKESmusic @nodoubt @Spotify @NBCTheVoice @gwenstefani @blakeshelton @kelly_clarkson Sounds like you are making it!! Glad for you and your family!!
@WILKESmusic @nodoubt @Spotify @NBCTheVoice @gwenstefani @blakeshelton @kelly_clarkson Literally the best, most memorable performance of last season! 😍
